SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.AIDE.repository

Interface ResourceRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Resource,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Resource>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Resource,Long>
public interface ResourceRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Resource,Long>
Repository interface for managing Resource entities. This interface extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and custom queries.

      Find a resource by its ID.
      Specified by:
